name: T!MEB!NDER: the Mandala Effect.
description:
Enclosed is a demo for a project I’ve been dreaming of for two years, though its Design Document was conceived in but two days, at the conclusion of my first playthrough of Kikiyama’s seminal classic Yume Nikki.

 

My intent for this publication is not only to garner attention and praise for this version, but to receive support to aid in the development of a full-length, multimedia experience, complete with an original soundtrack, (already in development,) animations, and voice acting.

 

If you wish to support this project financially, name your price when you download, or contact me for information regarding the Kickstarter campaign, which I aim to launch later this year.

 

My intent is to produce a deeply personal and commercially successful work with a lasting impact and legacy. I would not dream of it were it not a project which has captivated me and developed a Life of Its Own.

 

Please enjoy this for both what it is and for what you make of it, and please help it to become what it is fated to be.

Respectfully and with Sincerity,

Lin Ji.

Subliminal Mind Games.

[({L.J.)}]
